description.value: Make a ranged Strike with your ikon. If the Strike hits, the target must succeed at a @Check[reflex|against:exemplar] save against your class DC or the arrow transforms into a multitude of ethereal snakes that coil around the target, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized]{Immobilizing} it until it succeeds at an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] attempt against your class DC.
